name: carts
description: These are various simple assemblyscript wasm carts, used for testing.

scripts.build:justlog: asc src/justlog.ts -o build/main.wasm && cd build && zip -r justlog.null0 main.wasm && mv main.wasm justlog.wasm
scripts.build:http: asc src/http.ts -o build/main.wasm && cd build && zip -r http.null0 main.wasm && mv main.wasm http.wasm

author: David Konsumer <konsumer@jetboystudio.com>
